Name: Honey Butterfly Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed while riding Lantern Butterflies that enable Double Jump.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed while riding Lantern Butterflies that enable Double Jump. Double-click a location on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Autopilot is available only in Victoria Island and some other continents. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvine.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Move at a noticeably fast speed while riding Lantern Butterflies that enable Double Jump.
